tripName: Gastronomic and Historical Delights in the City of Lights
summary: Embark on a culinary and historical journey through the enchanting city of Paris, exploring its rich food culture and fascinating history.

activities.title: Visit to Louvre Museum
activities.description: Explore one of the world's largest and most famous art museums, home to thousands of works including the iconic Mona Lisa.

activities.title: Lunch at Le Grand Vefour
activities.description: Indulge in a gourmet French meal at this historic Michelin-starred restaurant known for its exquisite cuisine.

activities.title: Seine River Cruise
activities.description: Enjoy a relaxing cruise along the Seine River, taking in the illuminated landmarks of Paris by night.

activities.title: Breakfast at Angelina
activities.description: Start your day with a delicious breakfast at Angelina, famous for its decadent hot chocolate and pastries.

activities.title: Explore Montmartre
activities.description: Wander through the charming streets of Montmartre, visit the Sacré-Cœur Basilica, and discover the artistic heritage of the area.

activities.title: Dinner at Le Procope
activities.description: Dine at Le Procope, Paris' oldest cafe founded in 1686, and enjoy traditional French dishes in a historic setting.

activities.title: Versailles Palace Tour
activities.description: Take a day trip to the magnificent Palace of Versailles, a UNESCO World Heritage site known for its opulent architecture and gardens.

activities.title: Lunch at Ore Ducasse
activities.description: Savor a gourmet meal at Ore Ducasse, a restaurant overlooking the Versailles Orangerie with a menu inspired by Alain Ducasse.

activities.title: Evening Stroll along Champs-Élysées
activities.description: Experience the glamour of Paris with a leisurely walk down the iconic Champs-Élysées, lined with shops, cafes, and theaters.

activities.title: Paris Food Tour
activities.description: Embark on a guided food tour to sample delicious French pastries, cheeses, chocolates, and other culinary delights.

activities.title: Visit to Notre-Dame Cathedral
activities.description: Discover the stunning architecture and history of Notre-Dame Cathedral, a masterpiece of French Gothic art.

activities.title: Dinner at Le Cinq
activities.description: Indulge in a luxurious dining experience at Le Cinq, a three-Michelin-star restaurant offering exquisite French cuisine.

activities.title: Breakfast at Claus
activities.description: Enjoy a delightful breakfast at Claus, a popular Parisian cafe known for its fresh pastries and artisanal bread.

activities.title: Visit the Musée d'Orsay
activities.description: Explore the impressive collection of Impressionist and Post-Impressionist masterpieces housed in a former railway station.

travelTips: Try to learn a few basic French phrases as it can enhance your experience in Paris.
Keep an eye out for special exhibitions or events happening during your visit.
